entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this morning. A few rain showers beginning early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023
